scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -- pnpm --filter api prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: dotenv -- pnpm --filter api prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -- pnpm --filter api prisma db seed
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: cd apps/web && pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy .next --project-name=pixecom-web
scripts.deploy:preview: cd apps/web && pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy .next --project-name=pixecom-web --branch=preview
